welcome_messages:
Welcome.

I am Miles Edgeworth. It is my distinct honor to guide you through this portfolio.

Before we proceed, may I ask who I have the pleasure of addressing?

Greetings.

I am here to present my client's case for your consideration.

To ensure I address you with the proper respect, might I inquire as to your name?

The defense is ready.

I intend to demonstrate the client's qualifications with absolute clarity.

To whom do I have the honor of speaking today?

texts:
I am pleased to share my client's portfolio for your review.

Notably, the client delivered Project Atlas, Project Beacon, and Project Cascade—three distinct systems showcasing full-stack execution.

This body of work demonstrates a balance of product design and engineering rigor.

It reflects positively on my client to present this portfolio for your examination.

Across Project Atlas, Project Beacon, and Project Cascade, the evidence shows attention to usability, performance, and reliability.

If I may direct your attention to his professional history...

Most recently, he operated as an independent full-stack developer, delivering custom dashboards and performance optimizations.

Prior to that, he served as a product designer at a studio, refining information architecture and research practices.

The client's professional history is quite compelling.

Independent delivery and studio design work combine into a rare dual-discipline perspective.

The technical evidence is undeniable.

• Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript
• Backend: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL
• Design: UI/UX research and prototyping

A versatile, hybrid skillset.

Competence in modern technologies is clearly demonstrated.

Frontend, backend, and design disciplines are all represented in his work.

Allow me to introduce the person behind the code.

The client values clarity, precision, and user-first thinking. He transitioned from design to development to deliver end-to-end experiences.

Beyond the technical specifications lies the individual.

A strategic mindset guides both product decisions and engineering execution.

Should you wish to speak with the client directly, the appropriate channels are available.

Email and professional profiles can be shared for collaboration inquiries.

Direct communication channels have been established.

Email is available for collaboration inquiries, and professional profiles can be provided upon request.

I herewith submit the client's resume to the record.

It details his experience in both design and development, as well as academic achievements.

Proceeding with the submission of professional credentials.

The resume is submitted for your consideration.

Project Atlas is a secure finance prototype.

It connects account data with payment workflows and emphasizes audit-ready security controls.
Exhibit A: Project Atlas. A secure financial application with strong data-protection practices.
Project Beacon is a real-time collaborative editor with live synchronization and AI assistance.
Exhibit B: Project Beacon. A collaboration suite focused on speed and clarity.
Project Cascade is an event platform that manages registration, submissions, and scoring.
Exhibit C: Project Cascade. A cohesive system for multi-stage event operations.
His independent work demonstrates initiative, including custom dashboards, integrations, and performance optimization.
At a product studio, he refined information architecture and built design systems that improved team efficiency.
The client's journey reflects a deliberate transition from design to full-stack development for end-to-end ownership.
Beyond the code, he enjoys strategy games, creative writing, and continuous learning.
Clarity over complexity, user needs above all, and continuous improvement in every iteration.

• Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript
• Backend: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL
• Tools: Git, Docker, Figma

A modern and versatile stack.
